scale: memo: x scaled by 'values' - (vectors[i][4] is not presentedin dimesions). Currently only x can be scaled

serials.label: Front
serials.vec-desc: in the plane of Inactive,(x = 1, first parallel coord), bar[y = 0, z = 1] = 8, bar[y = 1, z = 1] = 6, where z = 1 such that all bars in 'Front' plane. Vectors are in form of [ith-parallel-coord, parallel-val, z = 1, value]

serials.label: Back
serials.vec-desc: in the plane of Inactive, bar[y = 0, z = 0] = 2, bar[y = 1, z = 0] = 5, where z = 0 such that all bars in 'Back' plane. Vectors are in form of [ith-parallel-coord, parallel-val, z = 1, value]
